Mod name in native language - used for status tooltip.

English: Shader, LOD distance, and other visual controls
Mod description, visibile in content manager.

English: This is the maximum range at which these items will be visible.
This is the maximum visibility distance that will be used if a dynamic distance cannot be calculated.
Everything will be visible within this distance, regardless of size.
Modifies the calculated visibility range - higher values mean greater visibility.
Sets the distance at which decals will fade into the background.
The model will transition from normal to LOD at this percentage of the maximum visibility distance.
The model will transition from normal to LOD at this distance.
